name: §f§n§lOrigin Details
description:
§fThis is a alternate species of dragon with plasma and starwisp abilities. Based heavily on the FutaraDragon Origin.§r

§c§l§nDavywn Murrper Variant Changes§r

§c§l§nInitial Experience
§fYou start with 10 levels of experience, enough to unlock your first ability.§r

§c§l§nStarwisps§r
§fDavwyn's Starwisps are less agressive than Futara's Energy Orbs. They do not attack most friendly or passive mobs, or mobs you've applied a name tag to. They will however attack angered mobs. They also come in a range of colours and will briefly light targets on fire.

§c§l§nCarnivore§r
§fYou can only eat meat be it cooked or raw. Raw meat is almost as good as cooked in most cases.§r

§c§l§nDigging Claws§r
§fYou can dig through soft ores, stone, sand, and dirt with your claws as if you had stone tools with your empty paws.§r

§c§l§nLimited Manipulators§r
§fYou have paws and a maw which limit your ability to wield weapons. You can't swing swords or use ranged weapons.§r

§c§l§nHunger Usage§r
§fActivities like running, jumping, and special moves that use stamina all affect your hunger.§r

§c§l§nHunger Effect Immune§r
§fYou have an resiliant stomach. Poisonous food can't give you the 'Hunger' effect.§r

§c§l§nNatural Exhustion§r
§fBeyond using up all of your stamina, running, jumping, and other activities use up your hunger bar. You'll need to eat more often when very active.§r

§c§l§nFall Immune§r
§fYour wings protect you from any fall damage, even if you haven't unlocked flight yet.§r

§c§l§nSneak to Climb§r
§fOnce you unlock ability to climb, you need to hold the Sneak key to climb on walls.§r

§c§l§nNo Horde Party§r
§fHorde Party from FutaraDragon race is removed. No surprise monsters appear.§r

§c§l§nCrystal Harvest§r
§fYour starwisp abilities allow you to convert sand into crystal.
Either put sand on your back (Offhand), Sneak and click the 'Place' button while looking into empty space, or have someone else 'Sneak' while they 'Place' sand on you to in the order of likelihood harvest glass, tinted glass, amethyst, or quartz at random.

§c§l§nStarwisp Dust§r
§fYour scales are covered in soft glowing starwisp dust which can be collected.
Either put an empty bottle on your back (Offhand), Sneak and click the 'Place' button while looking into empty space, or have someone else 'Sneak' while they 'Use' an empty bottle on you to harvest this dust into the bottle. The dust when used grants temporary night-vision by making user glow.§r

§c§l§nLow-Light Vision§r
§fIn darkness your eyes will adjust giving you full night-vision. This farther expands on FutaraDragon Energy Eyes.§r

§c§l§nGlowing§r
§fBecause of the starwisp dust on your scales you always give off a soft light.§r

§c§l§nSlightly shorter§r
§fYou're slightly smaller than a human.
(Requires Pehkui mod).§r

§c§l§nPlasma Beam§r
§fDavwyn's Plasma Beam is essentially identical to Futara's Hyper-Beam other than the sound it makes.§r

§c§l§nPlasma Blast§r
§fDavwyn's powers are plasma-based. Futara's Plasma Blast is renamed to Plasma Blast.§r

§c§l§nPlasma Bolt§r
§fDavwyn's powers are plasma-based. Futara's Energy Shot is renamed to Plasma Bolt.§r

§c§l§nMurrper§r
§fYour dragon species doesn't rawr, you 'Murrp'.§r

§d§l§nMain Futara Dragon Features§r

§f§l§nBasic Key Details§r
§f- (OP) = Origin Primary Button§r
§f- (OS) = Origin Secondary Button§r

§f§l§nBasic Mechanic Detail§r
§f- Use ability §7- (OP)§r
§f- Cycle abilities §7- (OS)§r
§f- Cycle options/settings §7- (Sneaking) + (Hold OS)§r
§f- Ability upgrade options:§r
§f-- Upgrade ability §7- (OP)§r
§f-- Cycle upgrades §7- (OS)§r
§f- Extra options:§r
§f-- Toggle Options §7- (OP)§r
§f-- Cycle Options §7- (OS)§r

§f§l§nBasic Mechanic Detail§r
§f- Emote§r
§f-- Sleep §7- (Hold Sneaking)§r
§f-- Deep Sleep §7- (Keep Hold Sneaking)§r
§f-- Sit §7- (Sneaking) + (Sneaking) + (Sneaking)§r
§f-- Shaking Dance §7- (Sneaking) + (Sneaking) + (Forward)§r
§f-- Silly Dance §7- (Sneaking) + (Sneaking) + (Left)§r
§f-- Stick Bug §7- (Sneaking) + (Sneaking) + (Right)§r
§f-- Hug §7- (Sneaking) + (Sneaking) + (Backward)§r

§f§l§nBasic Resources§r

§3§lStamina [Yellow Gauge]§r
§fUsed for special moves shown below.§r
§fThis resource will slowly drain hunger to refill over time.§r
§7- Required for sprinting on the ground or in liquid.§r
§7- Required for flying.§r
§7- Required for dashing.§r
§7- Required for some offensive abilities.§r

§3§lMana [Blue Gauge]§r
§fUsed for some abilities that cast powerful energy.§r
§fThis resource will slowly regenerate over time, not requiring hunger.§r
§7- Required for casting powerful abilities.§r

§3§lRage [Red Gauge]§r
§fUsed for some abilities that get stronger the more this bar fills up.§r
§fRage will build up when hitting enemies with compatible abilities.§r
§fRage will slowly deplete when out of combat.§r
§7- Some abilities change effect and gets much stronger when rage is built up.§r
§7- If rage is gained over the maximum limit, it will regenerate stamina instead.§r

§3§lUltimate [Purple Gauge]§r
§fUsed to cast Ultimate Ability when the gauge is full.§r
§fThe Ultimate bar will slowly fill up when hitting enemies with abilities.§r

§3§lCooldown [Gray Gauge]§r
§fShows the cooldown of movement abilities when they are on cooldown.§r

§f§l§nAbility Unlock Requirements:§r

§f§lMovement Abilities:§r
§3§l[5 Level]§r
§6§lSprint Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- Sprint at very high speeds.§r
§7- Costs stamina while sprinting.§r
§7- Double-tab movement key or use sprint button like vanilla sprinting.§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lClimb Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- The ability to climb on walls like a spider while holding the sneak button. (But dragon instead :3)§r
§3§l[20 Level]§r
§6§lFlight Ability§r
§7- Able to hover above the ground and maintain height.§r
§7- Able to freely move around while flying.§r
§7- Uses stamina while flying.§7- To switch between flight mode and ground mode; Double-tap (jump). (Tap within 1/5th of a second.)§r
§3§l[40 Level]§r
§6§lRoll Dash Ability§r
§7- Dash at high speed into any direction.§r
§7- Dashing uses Stamina.§r
§7- Double-tab movement key to dash.§r
§3§l[60 Level]§r
§6§lAir Roll Dash Ability§r
§7- Dash at high speed into any direction while in the air.§r
§7- Air-dashing uses Stamina.§r
§7- Double-tab movement key while in the air to air-dash.§r

§f§lEnergy Shield Ability Set:§r
§3§l[5 Level]§r
§6§lEnergy Shield Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- Slowly generate an energy shield.§r
§7- Energy shield reduces damage taken by 80%.§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lStronger Energy Shield Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- Slowly generates a second charge on Energy Shield, reducing damage for 2 hits.§r
§3§l[20 Level]§r
§6§lFast Charge Energy Shield Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- Generates Energy Shield faster.§r
§3§l[40 Level]§r
§6§lOver Charge Energy Shield Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- The ability to ‘overcharge’ the Energy Shield.§r
§7- Can charge up to 12 more additional charges, in total protecting from 14 hits. §r
§3§l[60 Level]§r
§6§lStable Over Charge Energy Shield Ability [Passive Ability]§r
§7- Overcharge no longer decays over time.§r

§f§lPlasma Bolt Ability Set:§r
§3§l[5 Level]§r
§6§lPlasma Bolt Ability§r
§7- Cast a short-range plasma energy beam to an entity.§r
§7- No Mana or Stamina is required to use this ability.§r
§7- Hold (OP) while ability is selected to shoot.§r
§7- The longer (OP) is held down, the faster it will shoot.§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lFaster Plasma Bolt Ability§r
§7- Increases charge speed.§r
§3§l[20 Level]§r
§6§lEven Faster Plasma Bolt Ability§r
§7- Increases charge speed more.§r
§3§l[40 Level]§r
§6§lSpinnnn Plasma Bolt Ability§r
§7- Increases charge speed much more.§r
§3§l[60 Level]§r
§6§lPlasma Bolt go-BRRRRRRR Ability§r
§7- I don't know how much charge speed is?.§r

§f§lPlasma Blast Ability Set:§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lPlasma Blast Ability§r
§7- Crate an explosive blast of plasma energy from the mouth.§r
§7- Mana is required to cast this ability.§r
§7- Press (OP) when the ability is selected to use.§r
§3§l[30 Level]§r
§6§lMore Plasma Blast Ability§r
§7- Increases blast damage.§r
§7- Increases damage area.§r
§3§l[50 Level]§r
§6§lPowerful Plasma Blast Ability§r
§7- Increases more blast damage.§r
§7- Increases more damage area.§r
§7- Increases blast knockback.§r
§3§l[80 Level]§r
§6§lMega Plasma Blast Ability§r
§7- Increases much more blast damage.§r
§7- Increases much more damage area.§r
§7- Increases more blast knockback.§r
§3§l[100 Level]§r
§6§lGigantic Plasma Blast Ability§r
§7- Nuke level blast damage.§r
§7- Massive building damage area.§r
§7- Heaven post man blast knockback.§r

§f§lHeal Aura Ability Set:§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lHeal Aura Ability§r
§7- Creates an aura around the caster that heals everyone inside including the caster and entities.§r
§7- Mana is required to cast this ability.§r
§7- Mana drains depending on the amount of healing being done.§r
§7- Press (OP) when the ability is selected to toggle the ability on or off.§r
§3§l[30 Level]§r
§6§lLarge Area Heal Aura Ability§r
§7- Increases recovery area.§r
§3§l[50 Level]§r
§6§lStand Grow Nature Heal Aura Ability§r
§7- Grow any crops/plants in a 3x3 area while standing still for a few seconds while the ability is active.§r
§3§l[80 Level]§r
§6§lRepair Durability Off Hand Heal Aura Ability§r
§7- Any item in the offhand will slowly repair itself while the ability is active.§r
§3§l[100 Level]§r
§6§lOver Charge Energy Shield Heal Aura Ability§r
§7- Slowly generates overcharge on Energy Shield while the ability is active.§r

§f§lStarwisp Ability Set:§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lStarwisp Ability§r
§7- Combine energy to create a sentient mass of energy that attacks for you with plasma energy beams.§r
§7- To focus on a specific entity, simply look at them at close range.§r
§7- Mana is required while focusing on an entity.§r
§7- Press (OP) when the ability is selected to toggle the ability on or off.§r
§3§l[30 Level]§r
§6§lMore Starwisp Ability§r
§7- Increases starwisp count to 2.§r
§7- Increases fire rate.§r
§3§l[50 Level]§r
§6§lMany starwisp Ability§r
§7- Increases starwisp count to 3.§r
§7- Increases more fire rate.§r
§3§l[80 Level]§r
§6§lSwarm Starwisp Ability§r
§7- Increases starwisp count to 4.§r
§7- Increases much more fire rate.§r
§3§l[100 Level]§r
§6§lNOT THE BEES Starwisp Ability§r
§7- Increases starwisp count to 8.§r
§7- It more than your screen refresh fire rate.§r

§f§lBeam Saber Claw Ability Set:§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lBeam Saber Claw Ability§r
§7- Combine energy to create plasma sabers attached to the dragon’s claws.§r
§7- Both Mana and Stamina are used to use this ability.§r
§7- Close range AOE damage.§r
§7- Press (OP) when the ability is selected to use.§r
§3§l[30 Level]§r
§6§lLarge Beam Saber Claw Ability§r
§7- Increases the area of effect when the Rage gauge is above 25%§r
§3§l[50 Level]§r
§6§lAngry Beam Saber Claw Ability§r
§7- Removes the ability cooldown.§r
§3§l[80 Level]§r
§6§lCombo Beam Saber Claw Ability§r
§7- Has a chance to combo-attack each time when using the ability.§r
§3§l[100 Level]§r
§6§lRushback Beam Saber Claw Ability§r
§7- When the Rage gauge is full, if (OP) is held, it will activate a special attack and restore 2 charges on Energy Shield.§r

§f§lPlasma Beam Ability Set:§r
§3§l[10 Level]§r
§6§lPlasma Beam Ability§r
§7- Combine energy and focus it into a long-range plasma energy beam.§r
§7- Mana is required for this ability.§r
§7- Attack focuses on distant entity first.§r
§7- Hold (OP) while ability is selected to charge and shoot.§r
§3§l[30 Level]§r
§6§lLong Range Plasma Beam Ability§r
§7- Doubles the beam range.§r
§3§l[50 Level]§r
§6§lEmpower Plasma Beam Ability§r
§7- Increases damage over time while using the ability.§r
§3§l[80 Level]§r
§6§lNuke Plasma Beam Ability§r
§7- Increases damage by a lot over time while using the ability.§r
§3§l[100 Level]§r
§6§lPlanet Remover Plasma Beam Ability§r
§7- Reduces damage buildup time by 75%.§r

§f§lRevenge Rampage Ultimate Ability Set:§r
§3§l[150 Level]§r
§6§lRevenge Rampage Ability§r
§7- Overcharges energy regeneration, forcing Mana and Stamina to regenerate over time.§r
§7- Gives multiple buffs.§r
§7- Restores health fully.§r
§7- Adds a temporary 6 extra hearts.§r
§7- Fully overcharges Energy Shield.§r
§7- The Ultimate gauge has to be full to use this ability.§r
§7- hold (OP) when ability is selected to active the ability.§r
§7- Ability will slowly drain Ultimate gauge and stay active until the Ultimate gauge runs out.§r
§6§lRevenge Stand Ability§r
§7- Effects are identical to Revenge Rampage Ability§r
§7- Is activated on death when Ultimate gauge is full.§r
§7- After the ability ends, the dragon is weakened for a period of time.§r

§2§lMobile Crafting Station§r
§fAllows people to use a crafting table located on your back, it’s not possible to use it yourself.§r
§7- Hold a crafting table in the offhand.§r

§2§lMobile Storage§r
§fAllows people to use an ender chest located on your back, it’s not possible to use it yourself.§r
§7- Hold an chest or ender chest in the offhand.§r

§2§lRidable Creature§r
§fA Soft back, good sit and relax.§r
§7- Other people can ride you while holding a saddle in the offhand. (NOT THAT WAY!)§r

§2§lPhysical Back Shield§r
§fDragon does not know how to use a shield, yet it’s still useful to have one on your back.§r
§7- Damage taken is reduced while a shield is being held in the offhand.§r

§2§l4 Legged Sprint§r
§fRunning on all fours can prevent some physical drag.§r
§7- Can sprint at full speed in water that’s one block deep or less.§r

§2§lStrong Internal Organ§r
§fRotten food is fine, you do not get sick.§r
§7- You can eat rotten flesh without any negative side effects like hunger.§r

§2§lLucky Dragon§r
§fWhy have a lucky cat if you have a lucky dragon!§r
§7- Other people can use an emerald on you (not consumable) to gain a temporary luck effect.§r

§4§lWeak Body§r
§fThis species has soft skin instead of sturdy scales.§r
§7- Base max health is 4 hearts.§r
§7- Food and saturation do not regenerate health normally.§r
§7- Health can only slowly regen if standing still for a while or through abilities.§r

§4§lLow Power§r
§fThis species starts with no power, the path of life is learning.§r
§7- Cannot sprint by default.§r
§7- Abilities and skills are unlocked using experience.§r
